synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process entailed dry synthesis of a sulfide solid electrolyte material by mixing Li2S, P2S5, LiI, LiBr, and Li3PO4, ball milling the composition in a ZrO2 pot with heptane, forming a sulfide glass, pelletizing, vacuum sealing, heat treating at 180Â°C for 2 hours, and conducting a cracking treatment to achieve a sulfide solid electrolyte material with an oxygen substitution amount of 10 mol%.
